short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Buy with OneClick from your favourite sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Autofill changed checkout from 300 key strokes to 15, OneClick gets us to a single click of the mouse, making checkout from any website one click away

The OneClick chrome plugin allows you to save your checkout information to your laptop and checkout with one click.

All of your personal information is encrypted and stored on your computer not on our serve which dramatically improves the security of storage.
